programme.title: The Way of the Master
programme.desc: Is baptism required for salvation? What about death bed confessions?

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Trafalgar Square hosts 21 competing artists, each with a distinct technique and style, as they paint famous faces in the hope of making it through to the final and winning a 10,000-pounds commission.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: The competition heads to Glasgow as the artists capture celebrity faces - including actress Sophie Turner from Game of Thrones - in the hope of making it through to the final and winning a 10,000 pounds commission.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Frank Skinner and Joan Bakewell take the competition to Dublin where 21 artists hope to wow the judges with portraits of Pauline McLynn, David Rawle and Lethal Bizzle.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: The final heat takes Joan Bakewell and Frank Skinner to Wales where artists paint a topless Gavin Henson, Lucian Freud's muse Sue Tilley and war veteran Simon Weston.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: The penultimate stage of the competition takes the four finalists to the French Capital, where they have six hours to paint author and model Sophie Dahl.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: The finalists unveil one last portrait before the judges enter tense discussions over the winner. Who will be crowned Portrait Artist of the Year?

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: We follow the series winner on his greatest challenge yet, as he paints his portrait of author Hilary Mantel for the British library. How will it be received?

programme.title: Inspector George Gently
programme.desc: Gently suspects murder when a man supposedly throws himself off the Tyne Bridge.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a fatal accident, Will is devastated to be the cause while Geordie rushes to exonerate his friend.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Vera must put together the pieces of a 11-year-old murder and stop a ruthless killer before he or she strikes again.

programme.title: Ripper Street
programme.desc: It is Reid's first day back at H Division, and the police force he once commanded is now under Inspector Drake's authority.

programme.title: Mum
programme.desc: It is raining and Cathy and her family are stuck indoors. Pauline has a visitor and Cathy makes an important decision.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A deck with a missing card provides Poirot with the clue he needs to solve the murder of the tyrannical head of a movie studio.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Two trains briefly pass each other when Miss Marple's friend witnesses a man in a carriage strangling a woman.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a fatal accident, Will is devastated to be the cause while Geordie rushes to exonerate his friend.

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: While working on restoring an Elizabethan garden, Rosemary witnesses the owner's cousin commit suicide only to later see him alive and well at an open air market.

programme.title: There She Goes
programme.desc: Rosie's excited for the family holiday in Devon but gets upset when the room changes and Captain Banana Crackers replaces Professor Fumbles. She obsesses about going home.

programme.title: The Marlow Murder Club
programme.desc: Liz Curtis becomes the prime suspect. DS Tanika Malik enlists Judith, Becks and Suzie as the killer strikes again, claiming a third victim.

programme.title: Funny Woman
programme.desc: Barbara, who now calls herself Sophie Straw, screws up her first gig but gets another chance.

programme.title: The Royals Revealed
programme.desc: This episode reveals how both Camilla Parker Bowles and Lady Diana Spencer would go on to blow the monarchy wide open.

programme.desc: Daphne teaches Niles how to dance for the country club's annual ball, and then joins him when his date cancels. In an attempt to impress guests, they dance with such passion that Niles professes his love for Daphne.

programme.sub-title: The Show Where Diane Comes Back
programme.desc: Frasier's ex-fiancee has come to Seattle. She tells of her perfect life in her Malibu beach house, but finally breaks down and admits she's miserable and needs help.

programme.desc: Marie gathers Robert's ex-girlfriends Amy and Stefania and his female police partner, Judy, together so they can discuss why her eldest son can't commit to a relationship.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: When Doug finds out that he can earn a free plasma screen TV at a time-share ski resort, he tricks Carrie into going.

programme.title: 48 Hours to Victory
programme.desc: The evacuation of Dunkirk and its impact on the outcome of World War II.

programme.title: Lost Women Spies
programme.desc: In 2000, boxes containing top-secret files were found in a garden shed in Cornwall. They detailed the lives and codenames of Britain's first female agents sent to the frontline during the war.

programme.title: Europe's Secret Armies
programme.desc: The Polish people were among the first to feel the full heart-stopping force of the German Wermacht. This is the story of the ways in which they fought back, including the Ghetto Uprising of 1943.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators
programme.desc: There is now doubt that Mohammad Amin al-Husayni, the Grand Mufti of Jerusalem collaborated with the Nazis. At what point does the desire to support your people become unacceptable?

programme.title: The War Files
programme.desc: From murder on the streets of Warsaw to the liberation of Europe, this lucid and engaging series provides a dramatic account of a conflict that engulfed the free world.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries of WWII
programme.desc: On May 10, 1941, Rudolph Hess, former deputy Fuhrer of the Third Reich, made a lone flight to Britain. Was Hess attempting to make peace with the British before the German invasion of the Soviet Union?

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team delve into the recent past to uncover the hidden archaeology behind the biggest battle that never was, the planned defence of Britain against a Nazi invasion in 1940.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: A Texan retreat for the rich and infamous, a remote island complex, scene of an uprising and a stronghold that inspired an Irish hero. Each haunted shell ready to tell its own story.

programme.title: France: The Postwar Recovery
programme.desc: In France, D-Day brought hope. But as the nation began to rebuild, the dream of a brighter future soon clashed with the harsh reality of post-war life.

programme.title: Prince Albert: A Victorian Hero Revealed
programme.desc: Through a wealth of personal archive, the Prince Consort's influence in shaping Britain is revealed.

programme.title: Royal Autopsy
programme.desc: Prof Alice Roberts uncovers the painful final days of Queen Anne. A post mortem reveals the truth behind her tragic losses and death from blood clots caused by autoimmunity.

programme.title: Edwardian Britain in Colour
programme.desc: Edwardian Britain was the richest, most powerful country in the world. We look at what this means for men, women and children hard at work in the mills and the mines of the north, and London's docks and markets.

programme.desc: The team descends on a field outside Bath to investigate what could have been one of the country's grandest Georgian houses.

programme.title: France: The Postwar Recovery
programme.desc: In France, D-Day brought hope. But as the nation began to rebuild, the dream of a brighter future soon clashed with the harsh reality of post-war life.

programme.title: Prince Albert: A Victorian Hero Revealed
programme.desc: Through a wealth of personal archive, the Prince Consort's influence in shaping Britain is revealed.

programme.title: Royal Autopsy
programme.desc: Prof Alice Roberts uncovers the painful final days of Queen Anne. A post mortem reveals the truth behind her tragic losses and death from blood clots caused by autoimmunity.

programme.title: Edwardian Britain in Colour
programme.desc: Edwardian Britain was the richest, most powerful country in the world. We look at what this means for men, women and children hard at work in the mills and the mines of the north, and London's docks and markets.

programme.title: Europe's Secret Armies
programme.desc: The story of the mistakes and miscalculations made by both the British and German armies as they fought for control of Crete in 1941.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators
programme.sub-title: The Jews Who Fought for Hitler
programme.desc: Examine the 1935 Nuremburg Laws, the final solution, and soldiers who were Jewish that were allowed to fight for Germany.

programme.title: The War Files
programme.desc: What was the unique talent of this man who single-handedly rewrote the rules of tank warfare? A man who reversed the course of the North African campaign until his defeat at El Alamein.

programme.title: The Abyss: The Rise & Fall of the Nazis
programme.desc: Hatred and the desire for revenge smouldered in the minds of many Germans after World War I. Many Germans believe that the Jews are the cause of all kinds of problems.

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: When a woman seduces Dom into the world of crime, the crew face trials that will test them like never before.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Pulled from the sea, Jason Bourne discovers he has the skills of a very dangerous man and no memory of his past.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Suffering from amnesia, Bourne has left his violent past behind and is living a normal life with Marie. His plans for a peaceful life are crushed when he narrowly escapes an assassination attempt.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is racing to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by the very organisation that hired him.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organisation's name.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating a highly skilled international rogue organisation that is committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment, Ethan chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the wrong hands. The IMF team must stop the fallout.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: When Eddie Brock acquires the powers of a Symbiote, he will have to release his alter-ego 'Venom' to save his life.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer Cletus Kasady, who discovers Eddie's secret and becomes the host for Carnage.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham and unveils his alter-ego: Batman, a masked crusader who uses his strength, intellect, and high-tech deceptions to fight the sinister forces that threaten the city.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: A rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker thrusts Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been years since Batman vanished into the night, turning from hero to fugitive. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar, and the emergence of masked terrorist, Bane.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: The untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, better known as sworn enemies, but who once were friends bonded like brothers.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: A battle between two alien robot clans, the Autobots and the Decepticons, is reignited on Earth, with a teenage boy being the only one who holds the power to stop it.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: When college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers, he must accept his destiny and join Optimus Prime and Bumblebee in their epic battle.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: When a small town police chief arrests John Rambo, he must make a daring escape and prepare himself for a one man war.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: After a disastrous parachute drop, Rambo is left stranded in the jungles with only his combat knife and bow and arrows to protect him.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: A Special Operations veteran is now into peace, serenity and non-violence. But when Trautman is held by the Soviets and interrogated, the CIA can do nothing and Rambo must come to his aid.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (1984)
programme.desc: A new kid in town who is picked on by bullies learns karate and eastern philosophy from Mr Miyagi, and learns how to fight back.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: Daniel, now a karate champ, goes to Okinawa with Mr Miyagi, his mentor. Miyagi rekindles an old flame while Daniel finds love, and enemies, of his own.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part III
programme.desc: A bad guy from the original Karate Kid plots revenge on young Daniel and his mentor Miyagi after they defeat his karate school and ruin his business.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Miami cops, Marcus Burnett and Mike Lowrey, have 72 hours to find $100 million worth of heroin that was stolen from the basement of police headquarters.

programme.title: Bad Boys 2
programme.desc: Burnett and Lowrey reunite as out-of-control, trash-talking cops. Bullets fly, cars crash, and laughs explode as they pursue a whacked-out drug lord from the streets of Miami to the barrios of Cuba.

programme.title: Bad Boys For Life
programme.desc: The original Bad Boys are back! After a string of assassinations and an attempt on Mike's life, he convinces a hesitant Marcus to hold off retirement and partner one last time.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: A young Peter Parker/Spider-Man begins to navigate his new-found identity as the web-slinging superhero.

programme.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
programme.desc: When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Fearsome monsters Godzilla and King Kong square off in an epic battle for the ages, while humanity looks to wipe out both of the creatures and take back the planet once and for all.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Tiger's Apprentice
programme.desc: Tom Lee discovers he is part of a long lineage of magical protectors known as the Guardians. With guidance from a mythical tiger named Hu and the other Zodiac animal warriors, Tom trains to take on an evil force that threatens humanity.

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a terrifying storm destroys their home, a speedy sloth named Laura and her kooky family move to the big city in their rusted old food truck hoping to make their business a success.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit's feud with Mr. McGregor escalates to greater heights than ever before as they rival for the affections of the warm-hearted animal lover who lives next door.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: With hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world.

programme.title: Tom & Jerry
programme.desc: A legendary rivalry re-emerges when Jerry moves into NYC's finest hotel on the eve of the wedding of the century, forcing the desperate event planner to hire Tom to get rid of him.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: The tale of Wilbur, the very small pig who wants to avoid ending up on the dinner table. Wilbur gets helps from Charlotte, a friendly spider, who assures him this will never happen.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails face Shadow, a powerful new foe. Outmatched, they form an unexpected alliance to stop him and protect the planet.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: The eccentric Dr Dolittle sets sail on an epic adventure to a mythical island, regaining his wit and courage as he crosses old adversaries and discovers wondrous creatures.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: A goofy pet detective is hired to track down 'Snowflake' the Miami Dolphins Football mascot.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Africa's the place, and Ace is on the case of the missing rare white bat, returning as the alligator-wrestlin', elephant-callin', all-round amazing pet detective.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An experiment with dinosaurs created from DNA becomes a disaster when sabotage sets the prehistoric monsters loose in an island theme park.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: It starts with two kids on a cold, cold wet day their mum is at work and they've no games to play! Then in walks the fun in the form of a Cat who pulls out the laughs from the brim of his hat.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Alex, Marty, Melman and Gloria find themselves in Africa, where Alex meets his long-lost parents. Meanwhile, Makunga, his father's rival, will stop at nothing to be the king of the jungle.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover, a travelling circus.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: When teenage Yi encounters a young yeti on the roof of her apartment building, she and her friends embark on an epic quest to reunite the magical creature with his family.

programme.title: An American Tail
programme.desc: Fievel the mouse travels from Russia to America with his family in the late 1800s to seek freedom from cat persecution.

programme.title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
programme.desc: Lured out west by the crafty Cat R. Waul, Fievel joins forces with famed lawdog Wylie Blurp to thwart a sinister plot to transform unsuspecting settlers into ... mouse burgers!

programme.title: Combat Wombat: Back 2 Back
programme.desc: An evil tech genius threatens to turn the city into a metaverse simulation, leaving the Combat Wombat to save the day.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Set in the mythical world of burly Vikings and fire-breathing dragons, a Viking teenager takes in an injured dragon and sees an opportunity to set his tribe on a new course.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: June discovers an incredible amusement park called Wonderland hidden in the woods. Wonderland is full of fantastical rides and talking animals, however it is in disarray.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: When a Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home, he finds himself lost and alone at Paddington Station. This charming family comedy is based on the classic children's books.

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Now happily settled with the Brown family, Paddington picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: The journey begins when young adventurer Sean receives a coded distress signal from a mysterious island where no island should exist.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: When genetically modified dinosaurs run amok at a new themed resort, a former military man and animal expert must use his special skills to halt an all-out prehistoric slaughter.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: Based on the hit '90s animation, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are back and have teamed up with news reporter April O'Neill to save New York City from the evil Shredder.

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: Poor, lonely and living on the streets, Top Cat meets Benny, a naive and good-hearted cat looking for adventure.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails face Shadow, a powerful new foe. Outmatched, they form an unexpected alliance to stop him and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious outsiders, it is up to two unlikely outcasts, and birds with temper problems, to set things right.

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: A smooth-talking rooster crash-lands into a farm and attempts to help a group of chickens escape. With teamwork and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt for freedom.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: A piglet won by a farmer in a raffle is raised by a sheepdog as one of her own and becomes a champion sheep-herder.

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: An egg emergency ensues when the rock 'n' roll-loving teen son of the Easter Bunny shirks his responsibility and runs away from home.

programme.title: Snitch
programme.desc: In the fast-paced action thriller, a father goes undercover as an informant and infiltrates a drug cartel on a dangerous mission risking everything to save his son from going to prison.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: After failing to fight for his family during a robbery, an unassuming father calls on skills from his hidden past to become a lethal vigilante blazing a wild ride to revenge.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: The web-spinning superhero must battle his own demons and a barrage of new villains including Sandman and Venom.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: After being denied his dream job with the Secret Service, a cop with a bad attitude must save his daughter and the President after heavily armed militants take over the White House.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: A system of satellites designed to protect the earth from natural disasters starts to malfunction, but who is responsible and can it be stopped?

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Humans come to realise that their new war against the Autobots could end with their own extinction when a threat more powerful than anything they have ever imagined presents itself.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A security repairman stationed on a desolate future Earth rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft. Her arrival will trigger a chain of events that will leave man's fate in his hands.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Blade - half-mortal, half-immortal - fights vampires who crave his special blood type for their plan to exterminate the human race.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds (2005)
programme.desc: Aliens have come to Earth in masses to destroy the planet. As they plough through the country in a wave of mass destruction and violence, a man must come to the defence of his estranged children.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: When college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers, he must accept his destiny and join Optimus Prime and Bumblebee in their epic battle.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet has a malfunction in its sleep chambers, and as a result two passengers are awakened 90 years too early.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: The lead-footed crew reunites in this turbo-fuelled tale of the vengeful brother of an international terrorist who sets his bloody sights on the boy racers that took his sibling down.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the evil Queen Ravenna orders the Huntsman to capture Snow White so she can rule eternally; however, he trains her in the art of war to defeat the wicked ruler.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Born in hell and bred to be evil, Hellboy was rescued by a benevolent doctor who raised him to be a hero. Now he must thwart a madman who wants to steal his powers and destroy mankind.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: When an Army Major is framed for treason, Reacher discovers she's the target of a massive government conspiracy and risks everything to take down the corrupt organisation.

programme.title: Robin Hood (2010)
programme.desc: In an age of oppression and shameless tyranny, an outlaw becomes the unlikely hero that saves a nation and inspires generations to fight for freedom.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: For the love of a beautiful woman a city will burn to the ground. An epic tale of honour, war, forbidden passion and the towering Trojan Horse.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City
programme.desc: Survivors try to uncover the truth behind the evil Umbrella Corp while battling bloodthirsty zombies in the wastelands of Raccoon City.

programme.title: Hard Kill
programme.desc: When a billionaire tech CEO hires a team of mercenaries to protect a lethal piece of technology, the mission becomes high risk when his daughter is kidnapped by a terrorist group.

programme.title: Bad Boys For Life
programme.desc: The original Bad Boys are back! After a string of assassinations and an attempt on Mike's life, he convinces a hesitant Marcus to hold off retirement and partner one last time.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: A system of satellites designed to protect the earth from natural disasters starts to malfunction, but who is responsible and can it be stopped?

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Long before the evil Queen Ravenna was vanquished by Snow White's blade, she watched silently as her sister, Freya, suffered a heartbreaking betrayal and fled their kingdom.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A security repairman stationed on a desolate future Earth rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft. Her arrival will trigger a chain of events that will leave man's fate in his hands.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When a teenage rebel is sent to Japan to live with his father, he is hooked on the treacherous world of street racing.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is crushed when his wife and children are killed after witnessing a mafia hit. With nothing left to live for he becomes The Punisher, a one-man judge, jury, and executioner.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The most determined of all vigilantes in Marvel Comics wages a no-holds-barred, one-man war against a horribly disfigured crime lord called Jigsaw.

programme.title: Wrath of Man
programme.desc: A new security guard for a cash truck company surprises his co-workers when he unleashes precision skills during a heist. The crew is left wondering who is he and where has he come from?

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer Cletus Kasady, who discovers Eddie's secret and becomes the host for Carnage.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 stories above ground, when his family are trapped inside by criminals.

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Packed with more heart-pounding and blood-curdling thrills than any theatre could show, this special unleashes the ultimate vision of George A. Romero's latest living-dead shock-fest!

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Left for dead after clashing with notorious Mexican drug kingpin Torrez, Machete escapes to Texas, looking to disappear and forget his tragic past. What he finds is a web of corruption and deceit.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a street-racing gang led by Dom Toretto, whose fans treat him like a rock star. Dirty money, big-rig hijacking, and high-octane action rev up this thrill ride.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: The story revolves around UN employee Gerry Lane, who travels the world in a race against time to stop a pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatening to decimate humanity itself.

programme.title: National Security
programme.desc: Everyone wants them dead, but they might just kill each other first. Two police academy rejects are at each other's throats and on the case of a smuggler with friends in high places.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Thought safely entombed beneath the unforgiving desert, an ancient princess, whose destiny was unjustly taken from her, is awakened, bringing terrors that defy human comprehension.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been years since Batman vanished into the night, turning from hero to fugitive. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar, and the emergence of masked terrorist, Bane.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels (2019)
programme.desc: In this next generation, the world's most highly trained women all over the globe are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in the jungle when a tough bounty hunter is sent deep into the Amazon to bring back his boss' son - a job that's not gonna be as easy!

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters' leader.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: Dev Patel achieves an astonishing feature directing debut with an action thriller about one man's quest for vengeance against the corrupt leaders who murdered his mother and continue to systemically victimise the poor and powerless.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: After failing to fight for his family during a robbery, an unassuming father calls on skills from his hidden past to become a lethal vigilante blazing a wild ride to revenge.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A security repairman stationed on a desolate future Earth rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft. Her arrival will trigger a chain of events that will leave man's fate in his hands.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: The ruler of wicked Gomorrah, who relies on a sorcerer's visions, lays waste to the tribes of the desert. The survivors hire an assassin to kill the sorcerer who turns out to be a beautiful woman.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is crushed when his wife and children are killed after witnessing a mafia hit. With nothing left to live for he becomes The Punisher, a one-man judge, jury, and executioner.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: Based on the hit '90s animation, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are back and have teamed up with news reporter April O'Neill to save New York City from the evil Shredder.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis: the three-headed King Ghidorah.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom

programme.desc: Filmed over a year, exploring the story of Trump's return to power through the lens of biographer and New York Times best-selling author, Michael Wolff.

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: Anora, a Brooklyn sex worker, marries an oligarch's son. But when the news reaches Russia, his parents rush to New York to have the marriage annulled, threatening her fairytale.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul unites with Chani and the Fremen to seek revenge. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is a London museum guard sent to Los Angeles in charge of a priceless painting. Mayhem erupts when the famously eccentric simpleton is mistaken for an art expert.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Beca, a freshman at her new college, finds herself muscled into a clique whose only thing in common is how good they sound when they sing together in perfect harmony in this laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Beca, Fat Amy and the Barden Bellas are back to pitch slap the world. After a scandal threatens to derail their last year at Barden, they worry that they've lost their harmony for good.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Can a clueless super spy save the day without denting the nation's pride, or his super-cool Aston Martin spy car?

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: When the group's sworn bachelor finally proposes to his thirty-something girlfriend, four friends head to Las Vegas with a plan to stop acting their age and relive their glory days.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Africa's the place, and Ace is on the case of the missing rare white bat, returning as the alligator-wrestlin', elephant-callin', all-round amazing pet detective.
